2. ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜! ìƒê°í•´ë³´ì

3. í•´ê²°ì½”ë“œ

#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

string solution(string number, int k) {

    while (k) {
        for (int i = 0; i < number.length(); i++) {
            if (i == number.length() - 1
                || number[i] < number[i+1]) {
                number.erase(i, 1);
                k--;
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    return number;
}
